data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick Barcelona.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Celta Vigo.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
In the minute 3, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Antoine Griezmann of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 8, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 11, Goal! Ansu Fati gives Barcelona a 0-1 lead in Vigo.
That's a fine assist from Philippe Coutinho.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Barcelona.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Celta Vigo throw-in in Barcelona's half.
In Vigo Celta Vigo drive forward through Jose Fontan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Barcelona a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Celta Vigo close to the penalty box.
Barcelona's Clement Lenglet has been booked in Vigo.
In the minute 25, Important block from the Barcelona defence as Iago Aspas fires in a strike for Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 27, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Nestor Araujo is on a sub for Jose Fontan for Celta Vigo.
In the minute 33, Free kick Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Celta Vigo.
Barcelona will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Celta Vigo.
In the minute 36, Celta Vigo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Barcelona.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 38, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Joseph Aidoo for Celta Vigo has been booked by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Free kick in a good position for Celta Vigo!
Clement Lenglet in Barcelona has been yellow-carded a second time by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and is being sent off.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Gerard Pique has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Municipal de Balaidos the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona.
Joseph Aidoo is back on the pitch.
The first half has been concluded at Municipal de Balaidos.
Ronald Araujo is replacing Antoine Griezmann for the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Vigo to check on Joseph Aidoo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Vigo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Joseph Aidoo with Miguel Baeza.
Throw-in Barcelona.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 48, Nestor Araujo (Celta Vigo) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Vigo.
Throw-in for Barcelona close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Goal! Barcelona extend their lead to 0-2 through Lucas Olaza.
Celta Vigo push forward at Municipal de Balaidos and Lucas Olaza gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Barcelona defence.
In the minute 53, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Celta Vigo.
In the minute 55, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vigo.
In the minute 58, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Barcelona's half?
Barcelona advance rapidly upfield but Carlos Del Cerro Grande blows for offside.
Philippe Coutinho (Barcelona) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Barcelona's Philippe Coutinho gets in a shot on goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Emre Mor with Santi Mina. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oscar Garcia.
Celta Vigo make their third substitution with Nolito replacing Gabriel Veiga.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Gerard Pique is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 65, Gerard Pique for Barcelona is back on the field again.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 69, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona just outside Celta Vigo's area.
At Municipal de Balaidos, Renato Tapia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a second substitution, with Pedri replacing Philippe Coutinho.
In the minute 72, Trincao is replacing Ansu Fati for the away team.
Nolito for Celta Vigo drives towards goal at Municipal de Balaidos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Miguel Baeza (Celta Vigo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 74, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vigo.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Renato Tapia with Fran Beltran.
Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Municipal de Balaidos.
Celta Vigo's Nolito misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
In the minute 80, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona.
In Vigo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Celta Vigo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Barcelona are caught offside.
Nolito of Celta Vigo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 83, Barcelona's Jordi Alba has been booked in Vigo.
The match at Municipal de Balaidos has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ivan Villar, who is down injured.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Ivan Villar returns to the field for Celta Vigo after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Barcelona.
In the minute 87, Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 88, Celta Vigo surge into the attack at Municipal de Balaidos but Nestor Araujo’s header is off-target.
Barcelona have a goal kick.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lionel Messi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
Fran Beltran for Celta Vigo has been booked by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Sergi Roberto extends Barcelona's lead to 0-3.
